nodes.text: Leigh Zieske is a graphic designer for Lucasfilm Ltd. who works in consumer products, games, and publishing.

Leigh Zieske is a graphic designer for Lucasfilm Ltd. who found her first Lucasfilm job through a creative staffing agency after finishing her MFA in graphic design. She has designed the typography and compositions and directed the cover artists and interior illustrators for various Disney–Lucasfilm Press-published young and junior reader books, along with young-adult novels. She advanced from a contracted worker in 2016 to a full-time graphic designer in 2017. Her position with Lucasfilm Ltd. is her first as a book designer. According to Zieske, one of the challenges in designing for Star Wars is including the logo amongst the title and art.
